com.sonf.polling

类 AbstractPollingIoProcessor<S extends AbstractIOSession>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sonf.polling.AbstractPollingIoProcessor<S>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    IOProcessor<S>
    直接已知子类:
    NioProcessor

    public abstract class AbstractPollingIoProcessor<S extends AbstractIOSession>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IOProcessor<S>
    Polling implementation of IOProcessor to handle I/O operations for sessions

    • 构造器详细资料

      • AbstractPollingIoProcessor

        protected AbstractPollingIoProcessor(java.util.concurrent.Executor executor)
        Constructor with the given executor. Note that we use the same executor with the IOController
        参数:
        executor - the Executor for handling I/O events

    • 方法详细资料

      • isDisposing

        public final boolean isDisposing()
        指定者:
        isDisposing 在接口中 IOProcessor<S extends AbstractIOSession>
        返回:
        true if and if only IOProcessor.dispose() method has been called. Please note that this method will return true even after all the related resources are released.

      • isDisposed

        public final boolean isDisposed()
        指定者:
        isDisposed 在接口中 IOProcessor<S extends AbstractIOSession>
        返回:
        true if all resources of this processor have been disposed.

      • dispose

        public final void dispose()
        Releases all resources allocated by this processor. Please note that this method might be blocked as long as there are any sessions managed by this processor.
        指定者:
        dispose 在接口中 IOProcessor<S extends AbstractIOSession>

      • add

        public final void add(S session)
        Adds a session to the processor to perform I/O operations with this session
        指定者:
        add 在接口中 IOProcessor<S extends AbstractIOSession>
        参数:
        session - The session to be added

      • remove

        public final void remove(S session)
        Remove the specified session from the processor so that the processor will closes the connection with this seesion and releases all related resources.
        指定者:
        remove 在接口中 IOProcessor<S extends AbstractIOSession>
        参数:
        session - The session to be removed

      • flush

        public final void flush(S session)
        Flushe the internal write queue of the specified session
        指定者:
        flush 在接口中 IOProcessor<S extends AbstractIOSession>
        参数:
        session - The session that has at lease one message to be send to the remote endpoint

      • registerNewSelector

        protected abstract void registerNewSelector()
                                     throws java.io.IOException
        In the case we are using the java select() method, this method is used to trash the buggy selector and create a new one, registring all the sockets on it.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - If we got an exception

      • isBrokenConnection

        protected abstract boolean isBrokenConnection()
                                       throws java.io.IOException
        Check that the select() has not exited immediately just because of a broken connection. In this case, this is a standard case, and we just have to loop.
        返回:
        true if a connection has been brutally closed.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - If we got an exception

      • getState

        protected abstract SessionState getState(S session)
        Get the state of a session (One of OPENING, OPEN, CLOSING)
        参数:
        session - the IOSession to inspect
        返回:
        the state of the session

      • select

        protected abstract int select(long timeout)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        poll sessions for the given timeout
        参数:
        timeout - milliseconds before the call timeout if no event appear
        返回:
        The number of session ready for read or for write
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - if some low level IO error occurs

      • isSelectorEmpty

        protected abstract boolean isSelectorEmpty()
        返回:
        whether the list of sessions polled by this IOProcessor is empty

      • wakeup

        protected abstract void wakeup()
        Interrupt the select(long) call.

      • allSessions

        protected abstract java.util.Iterator<S> allSessions()
        Get an Iterator for all the sessions polled by this IOProcessor
        返回:
        Iterator of IOSession

      • selectedSessions

        protected abstract java.util.Iterator<S> selectedSessions()
        Get an Iterator for the list of IOSession with data ready during the last call of select(long)
        返回:
        Iterator of IOSession ready for I/O operation

      • initToRead

        protected abstract void initToRead(S session)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Set the session to be imformed when there's data ready for read on it.
        参数:
        session - the session for which we want to wait for readable events
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - any exception thrown by the underlying system calls

      • destroy

        protected abstract void destroy(S session)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Destroy the underlying client socket channel
        参数:
        session -
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - any exception thrown by the underlying system calls

      • setInterestedInWrite

        protected abstract void setInterestedInWrite(S session,
                                             boolean isInterested)
        Set the session to be informed when it's writable
        参数:
        session - the session for which we want to wait for writable events
        isInterested - true for registering, false for removing

      • read

        protected abstract int read(S session,
                            IoBuffer buf)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Reads a sequence of bytes from a IOSession into the given IoBuffer.
        参数:
        session - the session to read
        buf - the buffer to fill
        返回:
        the number of bytes read
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - any exception thrown by the underlying system calls

      • write

        protected abstract int write(S session,
                             IoBuffer buf,
                             int length)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Write a sequence of bytes to a IOSession,
        参数:
        session - the session to write
        buf - the buffer to write
        length - the number of bytes to write can be superior to the number of bytes remaining in the buffer
        返回:
        the number of byte written
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - any exception thrown by the underlying system calls

      • isWritable

        protected abstract boolean isWritable(S session)
        Tells if the session ready for writing
        参数:
        session - the queried session
        返回:
        true is ready, false if not ready

      • isReadable

        protected abstract boolean isReadable(S session)
        Tells if the session ready for reading
        参数:
        session - the queried session
        返回:
        true is ready, false if not ready

      • doDispose

                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Dispose the resources used by this IOProcessor
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - if some low level IO error occurs
